item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数温和上升
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有增加，表明即使劳动力市场放缓，裁员人数仍处于较低水平。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased marginally last week, pointing to a still-low level of layoffs even as the labor market slows.】

item.title: VIEW 欧洲央行年内第二次降息
item.description: 随着通胀放缓和经济增长乏力，欧洲中央银行周四再次降息，但几乎没有提供下一步行动的任何线索，即使投资者押注未来几个月将稳步放宽政策。【原文：The European Central Bank cut interest rates again on Thursday as inflation slows and economic growth falters, but provided almost no clues about its next step, even as investors bet on steady policy easing in the months ahead.】

item.title: 淡水河谷认为到 2030 年其铁矿石产量的 10%将来自尾矿
item.description: 巴西矿业公司淡水河谷的一位高管告诉路透社，预计到 2030 年，该公司约 10% 的铁矿石产量将来自被称为 "尾矿 "的矿山废料的再利用，从而减少仍储存在大坝中的潜在危险材料的数量。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale expects that by 2030 some 10% of its iron ore output will come from the reuse of mine waste known as tailings, an executive told Reuters, reducing the amount of potentially dangerous material still stored in dams.】

item.title: 中国蚂蚁金服集团再融资 65 亿美元信贷额度
item.description: 阿里巴巴创始人马云支持的中国蚂蚁金服集团发言人周四表示，该公司正在对65亿美元的信贷额度进行再融资。【原文：China's Ant Group , backed by Alibaba founder Jack Ma, is refinancing a credit line of $6.5 billion, a company spokesperson said on Thursday.】

item.title: 福特专业汽车首席执行官泰德-坎尼斯退休
item.description: 福特汽车公司周四表示，其生产商用车的 Pro 部门首席执行官泰德-坎尼斯（Ted Cannis）将于本月底退休。【原文：Ford Motor said on Thursday Ted Cannis, CEO of its Pro unit, which makes commercial vehicles, would retire by the end of this month.】

item.title: 欧洲央行下调经济增长预期，但仍认为通胀率将在 2025 年底达到目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四下调了 2024 年的经济增长预期，但仍认为到 2025 年底通胀率将大致达到 2% 的目标。【原文：The European Central Bank lowered its 2024 economic growth projection on Thursday but still sees inflation broadly in line with its 2% target by the end of 2025.】

item.title: 陶氏下调第三季度营收预期，原因是得克萨斯州工厂发生意外事件
item.description: 由于位于得克萨斯州的一家工厂发生了意外事件，美国化学品制造商陶氏公司周四下调了第三季度收入预期。【原文：U.S. chemicals maker Dow lowered its third-quarter revenue forecast on Thursday due to an unplanned event at one of its plants in Texas.】

item.title: 增长和通胀放缓，欧洲央行下调利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四下调了利率，称较低的通胀和经济增长使其可以稍微松开刹车。【原文：The European Central Bank cut its interest rates on Thursday, saying lower inflation and economic growth were allowing it to take its foot off the brake slightly.】

item.title: 克罗格公司季度销售额超出预期
item.description: 克罗格公司（Kroger）周四的季度同店销售额超过了华尔街的预期，这是因为该公司努力以更低的价格提供新鲜的食品杂货，从而吸引了希望节省开支的顾客。【原文：Kroger beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly same-store sales on Thursday, as its efforts to offer freshly sourced groceries at lower prices helped pull in customers looking to save dollars.】

item.title: 美国官员将与顶级科技高管就推动人工智能发展举行会谈 -CNN
item.description: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）援引一位知情人士的话报道，来自开放人工智能（Open AI）、谷歌（Google）和Anthropic公司的高管将于周四在白宫与美国高级官员会面，讨论为人工智能提供动力所需的能源资源和基础设施。【原文：Executives from Open AI, Google and Anthropic will meet with senior U.S. officials at the White House on Thursday to discuss the energy resources and infrastructure needed to power AI, CNN reported citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 由于需求不佳，Stellantis 暂停生产电动菲亚特 500
item.description: Stellantis 公司周四表示，由于需求低迷，该公司将暂停生产全电动菲亚特 500 小型汽车，为期四周。【原文：Stellantis said on Thursday it would suspend production of the fully electric Fiat 500 small car for four weeks due to sluggish demand.】

item.title: 万事达卡将以 26.5 亿美元收购威胁情报公司 Recorded Future
item.description: 万事达支付公司周四表示，已同意以 26.5 亿美元的价格从私募股权公司 Insight Partners 手中收购威胁情报公司 Recorded Future。【原文：Mastercard has agreed to buy threat intelligence company Recorded Future from private equity firm Insight Partners for $2.65 billion, the payments company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国警告汽车制造商海外建厂的风险
item.description: 两位知情人士称，中国商务部在最近的一次会议上警告中国的汽车制造商，在海外进行汽车相关投资存在风险，因为他们正在寻求全球扩张，以应对国内市场增长放缓。【原文：China's commerce ministry has warned the country's carmakers of the risks of making auto-related investments overseas at a recent meeting, said two people briefed about the matter, as they seek global expansion to counter slowing growth in their home market.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称恒大许家印被关押在深圳特别拘留所
item.description: 两名知情人士称，中国恒大集团（中国房地产行业危机的核心企业）董事长许家印已被转移到深圳的一个特别拘留中心。【原文：Hui Ka Yan, the chairman of China Evergrande Group - the company at the centre of the country's property sector crisis - has been moved to a special detention centre in Shenzhen, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，微软将在 Xbox 游戏部门裁减 650 个支持岗位
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，微软表示将在其 Xbox 部门裁员 650 人，这是该公司今年第三次裁员，因为该公司正试图控制成本并整合其斥资 690 亿美元收购的动视暴雪公司（Activision Blizzard）。【原文：Microsoft said it is cutting 650 jobs in its Xbox unit, the third such layoff this year as the company tries to rein in costs and integrate its $69 billion acquisition of Activision Blizzard, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空上调盈利预期，原因是夏季需求和与停电相关的预订情况
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团（Alaska Air Group）周四上调了第三季度利润预期，主要受益于强劲的夏季旅游需求，以及因七月份全球网络故障导致航班取消而滞留的乘客重新订票。【原文：Alaska Air Group raised its third-quarter profit forecast on Thursday, benefiting from strong summer travel demand and re-bookings from passengers stranded due to flight cancellations caused by a global cyber outage in July.】

item.title: 特朗普的潜在回归加剧了新兴市场投资者的担忧
item.description: 美国总统大选的激烈角逐令新兴市场的投资者感到不安，他们担心前总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫可能会在新兴市场大放异彩之际对其造成损害。【原文：A tight U.S. presidential election race has unnerved investors in emerging markets, who fear a return of former President Donald Trump to the White House could hurt emerging markets just as they were poised to shine.】

item.title: 总理哈里斯：苹果退税为爱尔兰基础设施建设带来机遇
item.description: 爱尔兰总理西蒙-哈里斯（Simon Harris）周四表示，本周欧盟法院下令苹果公司向爱尔兰支付 130 亿欧元（约合 144 亿美元），这为政府提供了解决基础设施、房屋建设和资本项目等迫切需求的机会。【原文：An EU court order this week that Apple pay Ireland 13 billion euros ($14.4 billion) presents the government with opportunities to address pressing infrastructure, housebuilding and capital project needs, Prime Minister Simon Harris said on Thursday.】

item.title: 裕信银行收购德国商业银行，并购前景看好，欧洲银行业崛起
item.description: 周四，欧洲银行股继续上扬，主要原因是联合信贷银行（UniCredit）在一天前收购了德国商业银行（Commerzbank）9%的股份。【原文：Shares in European banks continued their upward trend on Thursday, mostly driven by the read-across from UniCredit's sweep to buy a 9% stake in Germany's Commerzbank a day earlier.】

item.title: Moderna 预计 2025 年销售额可达 35 亿美元
item.description: Moderna 周四表示，预计明年的销售额将在 25 亿美元到 35 亿美元之间，并预测新产品的推出将推动 2026 年到 2028 年的年均收入增长率达到 25%。【原文：Moderna on Thursday said it expects sales of between $2.5 billion and $3.5 billion next year, and forecast that new product launches would drive an average annual growth rate of 25% in revenue between 2026 and 2028.】

item.title: 瑞银资产管理因增长风险削减全球投资组合中的企业债券风险敞口
item.description: 瑞银资产管理公司（UBS Asset Management）的一位高级基金经理表示，在市场反弹期间，该公司一直在抛售其全球投资组合中的公司债券，理由是担心经济放缓或美国大选迫在眉睫可能引发波动并抹杀收益。【原文：UBS Asset Management has been selling corporate bonds in its global portfolios during market rallies, a senior fund manager said, citing concerns that a slowing economy or the looming U.S. election could spark volatility and wipe out returns.】

item.title: 在申请失业救济人数公布之前，期货小幅走高
item.description: 周四，美国股指期货小幅上涨，在上一交易日扭转跌势收高，市场关注美联储下周可能降息前即将公布的经济数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose slightly on Thursday, after reversing a selloff to close higher in the previous session, with focus on upcoming economic data in the lead up to the Federal Reserve's likely interest rate cut next week.】

item.title: 专家称，特朗普的加征关税计划将使航运成本飙升，就像2018年一样
item.description: 航运和零售业专家表示，美国总统竞选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）如果在11月再次入主白宫，其提高进口商品关税的计划将使货运费飙升并加速通货膨胀，就像他在2017-21年任期内所做的那样。【原文：U.S. presidential contender Donald Trump's plan to hike tariffs on imports if he is elected back to the White House in November would send cargo rates soaring and accelerate inflation, just like it did during his 2017-21 term, shipping and retail experts said.】

item.title: 大选临近，美国汽油价格将降至每加仑 3 美元以下
item.description: 分析师本周表示，美国驾车者最快将在下个月看到汽油价格在三年多来首次降至每加仑 3 美元以下，也就是在他们参加 11 月总统大选投票前不久。【原文：U.S. motorists should see gasoline prices fall below $3 a gallon for the first time in over three years as soon as next month, shortly before they go to vote in November's presidential election, analysts said this week.】

item.title: 通用汽车与现代汽车探讨联合汽车开发项目
item.description: 通用汽车公司和现代汽车公司周四表示，双方已同意探索未来在关键战略领域的合作，包括潜在的联合汽车开发、供应链问题和清洁能源技术。【原文：General Motors and Hyundai Motor Co said on Thursday they have agreed to explore future collaboration across key strategic areas including potential joint vehicle development, supply chain issues and clean-energy technologies.】

item.title: 工人投票决定合同，波音罢工威胁迫在眉睫
item.description: 波音公司美国西海岸工厂的工人将于周四就备受批评的新合同和可能的罢工进行投票，这给这家长期生产延误和债务不断增加的飞机制造商带来了巨大压力。【原文：Boeing's U.S. West Coast factory workers will vote on a much-criticized new contract and a possible strike on Thursday, piling pressure on the planemaker as it wrestles with chronic production delays and mounting debt.】

item.title: 早间竞标：第一刀不一定最深
item.description: 阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.】

item.title: 美国对约 3,118 辆 VinFast 汽车展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周四表示，已对约 3118 辆 VinFast 汽车展开调查，原因是有报告称车道保持辅助系统（Lane Keep Assist System）无法正常工作。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration on Thursday said it has opened a probe into about 3,118 VinFast vehicles over reports that the Lane Keep Assist System was not functioning correctly.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，通用磨坊正在就向 Lactalis 和 Sodiaal 出售北美酸奶业务进行谈判
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，通用磨坊公司正在洽谈将其在美国和加拿大的酸奶业务分别出售给法国乳制品公司Groupe Lactalis和Sodiaal，这两家公司旗下拥有Yoplait等品牌。【原文：General Mills is in talks to sell its U.S. and Canadian yogurt operations, which houses brands such as Yoplait, to French dairy firms Groupe Lactalis and Sodiaal, respectively, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国商业银行、意大利联合信贷银行股价涨幅扩大，因 Orcel 提出计划
item.description: 德国商业银行和意大利联合信贷银行周四股价延续涨势，此前意大利银行首席执行官安德烈亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）提出了收购其德国竞争对手更多股份甚至将其兼并的计划，这加剧了市场对该地区进一步交易的猜测。【原文：Commerzbank and UniCredit shares extended gains on Thursday after the Italian bank's CEO Andrea Orcel laid out plans to buy more of its German rival or even take it over, fuelling speculation about further dealmaking in the region.】
